name: Employment sector of S&E highest degree holders, by level and field of highest degree: 2017
description: Employment sector of S&E highest degree holders, by level and field of highest degree: 2017

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: highest_degree_field_and_level
variableMeasured.description: Highest degree field and level hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_for_profit_businesses
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry For Profit Businesses

variableMeasured.name: field_business_or_industry_self_employed_unincorporated_businesses
variableMeasured.description: Business Or Industry Self Employed Unincorporated Businesses

notes: All S&E highest degree holders includes professional degree holders not reported separately. The 2-year and precollege institutions include 2-year colleges and community colleges or technical institutes and preschool, elementary, middle, and secondary schools. The 4-year institutions include 4-year colleges or universities, medical schools, and university-affiliated research institutes. The education sector includes public and private institutions. Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Numbers are rounded to the nearest 1,000. Percentages are based on rounded numbers.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Science Foundation, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), 2017.Science and Engineering Indicators
